page.title: 08Day in the life of.. cont..
page.content:
page 2 ...we got some lovely coloured flowers for our mums. After walking a little while longer, we found some wild strawberries . We rested and ate a few. My friend Philipa had brought a container, so we picked some strawberries. Stephanie, Philipa's sister, claimed she heard water running not very far away, so we agreed we would have our picnic by the water's edge. We ran down to the stream and ate our picnic. We swapped some food and Philipa said, "What a lovely picnicy day."
By Catherine Long and Frances Johnson.
